Web Development - Code your Way at RNSIT September 28, 2014,

University Event

The whole event will be divided into following format: Session I - General Introduction on Web Technologies Session II - Hands-on session to code in HTML, CSS and JS Session III - Building an app/website based on what is learnt Session IV - Mini-Hack (One hour Competition).

Intoduction to Cloud Platform at SJBIT September 27, 2014,

University Event

The Google Student Club at SJB Institute of Technology conducted their first event in 2014 and gave an introduction to the Google Cloud Platform

Google App Engine Workshop for BMSCE September 26, 2014,

University Event

The Google Student Club at BMS College of Engineering, Bangalore organized their second event for the year - Google App Engine Workshop. The event was conducted by Mr.Shashidhar Gurumurthy from GDG Bangalore via Google Hangouts. The focus of the session was to build an app for their University using Google App Engine.

Java Workshop at K.S.I.T September 21, 2014,

University Event

The Google Student Club at K.S. Institute of Technology, Bangalore organized their first event, which was an orientation event and a workshop on Java to enable them to build applications on mobile and web platforms.

BMSCE Orientation Event - Hangouts '14 September 11, 2014,

University Event

Orientation event in BMS College of Engineering, Bangalore. GDG Bangalore is helping the Google Student Club at BMSCE start off with their first event.

Explore new Possibilities - Post Google I/O August 2, 2014,

Google I/O

We are conducting this meetup as a follow up for the Google I/O. Since Google is exploring the field of Andoird, we wanted to get in touch with developers and wanted to explore the eco-system what Google has provided.

Google I/O Extended 2014 June 25, 2014,

Google I/O

Google I/O Extended is live streaming of Google I/O Developer Conference. Many opportunities to explore what Google is going to announce new in Technology.

Google Cloud Workshop June 7, 2014,

Google Cloud

Google Cloud Workshop is an event as a follow up session of Google Cloud India Roadshow. Participants will be given hands-on session on how to use different services of Google w.r.t. Google Cloud Platform.

Google Cloud Platform Developer Roadshow May 10, 2014,

Google Cloud

Google’s Cloud Platform Developer Roadshow is happening in India. After successful events at Hyderabad and Chennai the Google India Roadshow is coming to Bangalore at The Leela Palace on 10th May 2014. Specifically, the full day event will feature sessions on new technology in the cloud platform, Google App Engine, Google Compute Engine, how Google cloud products can be used by startups and much more. There will also be a demo session for a live experience. The event will also be a good opportunity to engage with Google Cloud Developer Experts.

HTML5 and Web Development April 5, 2014,

Web Development

HTML5 and Web Development Workshop is a hands on for a wide range of students. Focus is to touch upon basics of HTML5 and to give the students a kick start in web development.

Google Women Tech Makers March 22, 2014,

Women Techmaker

HTML5 and Web Development Workshop is a hands on for a wide range of students. Focus is to touch upon basics of HTML5 and to give the students a kick start in web development.
